content:
IStoryFragmentProvider Interface

Definition

Defines a method for adding the StoryFragments part of the markup to an XPS package.

In this Article

public interface IStoryFragmentProvider

Remarks

For more information about the StoryFragments element of an XPS package, see chapter 9 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) specification, which you can obtain at XPS: Specification and License Downloads.

Methods

AddStoryFragment()

Adds a StoryFragments element to an XPS package.

public System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure AddStoryFragment ();
Returns
XpsStructure

An XpsStructure that represents a StoryFragments element in an XPS package.

Remarks

For more information about the StoryFragments element of an XPS package, see chapter 9 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) specification, which you can obtain at XPS: Specification and License Downloads.
